effect.black-white: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.
effect.black-2-white-2: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.

flavor_text.black-white: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.
